plot: When a girl dies a mysterious death, Scully and Mulder discover more girls' lives are at stake in a divine battle of good versus evil.

In the confessional at her local church, Scully tells a priest that she is responsible for the death of a young girl. In flashbacks, Scully and Mulder are called in when a young woman is found dead in the street not far from her home. No one has any idea how she got there as she was severely handicapped and was not mobile. Scully's parish' priest asks her to look into the case as the girl's parents are also members of the parish. As the case progresses, Scully will come to face evil and must also come to terms with the loss of her own daughter.—garykmcd

A wheelchair-bound handicapped girl manages to walk out of her house and is later found dead in a praying position with her eyes burned out. Scully assists in the investigation at the bidding of her priest. She discovers three other girls with the same deformities who may be in a similar danger. The case soon comes to have deep religious and personal significance to Scully concerning her deceased daughter, Emily.—Muldernscully
